SECTION_HISTORY.TITLE: Our Story
SECTION_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION_ONE: It was back in December 2014 when we first met and it started exchanging a quick “nice to meet you” and later in August of 2017 our paths would cross again and after a very patriotic date on September 16th we would quickly become inseparable.
SECTION_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION_TWO: It wasn’t long before we came to love each other unconditionally and become a family along with our daughter Sofia.
SECTION_HISTORY.DESCRIPTION_THREE: After 8 years of so many adventures and treasured moments we’re very pleased to invite you to a celebration of our love.

CEREMONY.TITLE: Wedding
CEREMONY.DESCRIPTION: Our wedding will be held in Hacienda Murmullo de Agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC

DRESS_CODE.TITLE: Dress code
DRESS_CODE.DESCRIPTION_TWO: Women: Midi and long dresses are welcome, floral or romantic (the choice is yours)

RECEPTION.TITLE: Wedding Reception
RECEPTION.DESCRIPTION: The celebration will be held in Hacienda Murmullo de Agua, Valle de Guadalupe, BC

SECTION_GIFTS.TITLE: Our most treasured gift will be your attendance
SECTION_GIFTS.DESCRIPTION: However, if you would like to bring a gift, we will have a card box available for monetary gifts in keeping with Mexican tradition. Gift cards to Target, Walmart, or Costco would also be greatly appreciated.

SECTION_LOCATION.INTRO: Wedding and reception will be held in
SECTION_LOCATION.STAY_DESCRIPTION: We greatly appreciate that you have chosen to celebrate with us, and we know it’s a long way home after a party, for those want to stay in Valle de Guadalupe we have a few options below:

HOTELS.NAME: Tierra Mía Hacienda ruta del Vino
